title: Sleet Storm
content:
Sleet Storm Level 3 Conjuration Spell Call forth a storm that disrupts the Concentration of spellcasters, douses fires, and creates an ice surface. 10 turns 18m CON Save Concentration Action Level 3 Spell Slot

Level 3 Conjuration Spell

Call forth a storm that disrupts the Concentration of spellcasters, douses fires, and creates an ice surface.

18m CON Save Concentration
